title: Michael's Naturopathic Programs Ultimate Detox & Cleanse 2 Week Program 1 Kit - Swanson®
description: Improve your day-to-day wellness with Michael's Naturopathic Programs Ultimate Detox & Cleanse 2 Week Program 1 Kit from Swanson Health Products.
cleaned_text: Program [( 3 )](/) [Michael's Naturopathic Programs](/michaels-naturopathic-programs)- Ultimate Detox & Cleanse 2 Week Program [( 3 )](/) [sign in](/gateway-login?return_to=/p/michaels-naturopathic-program-ultimate-detox-cleanse-2-week-program-1-kit)to add to your favorites - Convenient and easy-to-use packets - 2-week program - Cleanses blood, colon, liver and fat A two-week program, Michael's Naturopathic Programs Ultimate Detox & Cleanse is a great start to your diet. This vegetarian and kosher formula cleanses the blood, colon, liver and fat. Ultimate Detox & Cleanse aids digestion, helps cleanse the intestinal tract and may help decrease appetite. This formula also supports liver wellness, blood detoxification and fat metabolism while delivering fiber and more. With individual packets, they are convenient and easy-to-use. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. - Convenient and easy-to-use packets - 2-week program - Cleanses blood, colon, liver and fat A two-week program, Michael's Naturopathic Programs Ultimate Detox & Cleanse is a great start to your diet. Supplement Facts 14 servings per container Serving Size Three (3) Packets Daily |Amount Per Serving||% Daily Value| | Liver Wellness | |Vitamin A (as Beta Carotene) 450 mcg |50%| | 30 mg |2500%| Acid) | 30 Choline Bitartrate) 200 mg Detoxification Factors | |Iron (as Iron Amino Acid Chelate) | 2 mg |11%| |Zinc (as Zinc Monomethionine***) | 9 mg |82%| |Manganese Manganese Amino Acid Chelate) | 6 mg Amino Acid Chelate) | 600 mcg Hydrochloride) | 100 mg Choline Bitartrate) | 200 | Polynicotinate****) | 200 mcg |571%| Potassium Amino Acid Chelate) | 99 mg |2%| |Proprietary Blend | 1 g More | |Dietary Fiber | 1.34 g |5%*| |Proprietary Blend | (Oryza sativa), Flax Seed (Linumusitatissimum), Psyllium Seed (Plantago psyllium), Apple Fruit, Garlic Clove Extract (Allium esculentus)| *The % Daily Value (DV) tells you how much a nutrient in a serving of food contributes to a daily diet. 2,000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advise. **Daily Value not established. OTHER INGREDIENTS: Dicalcium Phosphate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Stearic Acid, Modified Cellulose Gum, Vegetable Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide and Pharmaceutical Glaze (Shellac, Povidone). Contains soy. Contains tree nut. DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Take the contents of one (1) packet with each meal (3 packets daily). Follow this schedule for 14 days. Throughout the time you are using Michaels® Ultimate Detox & Cleanse program, drink plenty of water (non-tap, distilled is best): 8 glasses or more daily. It is also helpful to increase your consumption of fibrous fruits and vegetables while decreasing consumption of processed foods, meat and dairy products. Our products contain organically grown herbs, when available. CAUTION: Contains Phenylalanine and should be avoided by phenylketonurics and women who are pregnant or lactating. WARNING: Accidental overdose of iron-containing products is a leading cause of fatal poisoning in children under six. KEEP THIS PRODUCT OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. In case of accidental overdose, call a physician or Poison Control Center immediately. WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which is known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
